start_message: Welcome! I can help you create a video script or convert text to audio. Please choose one of the options below.
voice_tutorial_message: How to Use the Text to Voice Feature This feature allows you to directly convert text into audio. Command Format: /voice [voice_name] [your text] Example: /voice Rachel Hi, this is a test audio. To see the list of available voices, use the /listvoices command. You can also change audio settings with the /settings command.
upload_video_prompt: Alright! Please upload your video now. You can cancel this process by pressing the cancel button below.
processing_video: Your video is being analyzed. Please wait, this may take a moment...
analysis_error: Sorry, an error occurred while analyzing your video. Please try again.
choose_script_style: Analysis complete! Now, choose your preferred script style:
custom_style_prompt: Please enter your desired custom style (e.g., 'funny and informative').
generating_script: Got it! Generating the script in your chosen style...
revise_prompt: Sure. Please provide your revision instructions. Example: 'Make the opening more formal'.
agreed_to_script: Great! The script is finalized. Now, choose a voice for the narration:
generating_audio: Voice selected! I‚Äôll generate the audio files and send them one by one. Please wait...
audio_generation_complete: All audio files have been successfully created!
audio_generation_error: Sorry, an error occurred while generating the audio files. Please try again later.
database_error: Sorry, there was a system error. Please try again later.
voice_command_usage: Incorrect usage. Please use the format: /voice [voice_name] [text to convert] Example: /voice Rachel Hello everyone, this is a test.
voice_not_found: Voice '{{.VoiceName}}' not found. Use /listvoices to see the available list.
caption_too_long_error: Failed to send audio: The provided text is too long.

help_message: Bot Help Guide Here is a list of available commands and features: Main Commands - /start - Start or restart the bot and display the main menu. - /help - Display this help message. - /settings - Change audio generation settings (stability, clarity). - /cancel - Cancel any ongoing process and return to the main menu. - /listvoices - Show the list of available voices. Text to Voice Feature - /voice [voice_name] [text] - Convert text to audio instantly. Press the "Text to Speech" button on the main menu for a full tutorial. Inline Mode Use the bot in any chat with the format: @ttsmakebot [voice_name] [text]
voice_list_header: Here is the list of available voices:
voice_command_copied: Click the text below to copy, then add your message: /voice {{.VoiceName}}
settings_menu_header: Audio Settings Here you can adjust parameters for voice generation. Current values: - Stability: %.2f - Clarity: %.2f Select the setting you want to change.
prompt_stability: Enter a new Stability value (a number between 0.0 and 1.0). Higher stability makes the voice more consistent but can sound monotonous. Lower values make it more expressive but less stable. Default is 0.75.
prompt_clarity: Enter a new Clarity value (a number between 0.0 and 1.0). Higher clarity makes the voice sound more like the original, but may sound robotic. Lower values are more stable but less realistic. Default is 0.75.
settings_invalid_value: Invalid value. Please enter a number between 0.0 and 1.0.
inline_help_message: Inline Mode You can use this bot directly in any chat to convert text to audio. Format: @ttsmakebot [voice_name] [your text] Example: @ttsmakebot Rachel hi how are you? Choose the voice result that appears, and the bot will send the audio to the chat.
donate_message: Support the development of this bot by donating! Every bit of support is greatly appreciated.
